sentence.idiomatic: An ordinary life is also a kind of blessing.
I am just an ordinary teacher.
A lot of movie stars long to have an ordinary life.
We still can't get in touch with her.
How can I ever get in touch with him?
When I arrive there I will get in touch with you again.
Today on the street I ran into an old classmate.
Guess who I ran into yesterday?
I have never come across a person like him before.
What's wrong? Are you in a bad mood?
He is in a bad mood today, don't provoke him to get angry again.
Going out and strolling for a while, my mood has also improved.
She is always our "pistachio."
She certainly is our family's "pistachio."
They all say I am their "pistachio."
I heard the two of them broke up, is it true?
She just broke up with her boyfriend, so she is not in a very good mood.
Last year they had already broken up.
Do you know which fruit is most suitable to eat in the fall?
This piece of clothing is not suitable at all, it would be best to exchange it for another one.
I think that the two of them aren't at all suitable for each other.
Every person should treasure time.
We all must learn to cherish all the things we have at present.
There are things that we would only cherish them after we lost them.
I can't really console other people.
When I was suffering the most, it was her by my side continuously comforting me.
At this time she needs your consolation the most.
I hope you can give me a chance to make it up to you.
He said he can't remedy his mistake.
These losses cannot be remedied.
Lili, it's so hard to get together with you!

That's enough. It's you who is the busy one! Every day if you're not on the TV then you're in the newspaper. An ordinary person like me--how could I dare to take the initiative to get in touch with you.

It's different with you than with other people. If I were even busier, I still would squeeze in the time to come and see you. Oh, last time after we met in the coffee shop I sent you a text message, how come you never responded?
No, not at all. But in the last little while my mood hasn't been that great.
What's wrong? That's not like you. In our eyes, you are always a ``pistachio," as if every day you have so much to laugh about.
Really? Except now I can't even crack a smile.
Lili, what really is the matter with you?
I broke up with Zhang Liang.
Huh? I'm sorry.
Forget about it. I'm over it now. Probably he and I aren't right for each other.

It's good that you can think of it that way. He's the one that doesn't understand how to cherish you. Lili, do you know how good you are? I think the man that gets to take care of you is definitely the luckiest man in the world.
Am I that good? Could it be that you are fooling me? But I still thank you for your consolation. All right, I'm fine now. Really.

If you are OK then I can set my mind at rest. Actually, before I always thought that I was so smart. Only now do I realize that I am the stupidest person in the world, because I've lost you. But now it's OK--heaven has given me another chance to make it up to you, I can again be by your side to accompany you. And don't worry, I will always be here.
Will you really?
Trust me, all these years, it's only been you in my heart.
